document.full_text: general motors co plans to invest $69 million and add about 2,500 jobs at its detroit-hamtramck assembly plant to build the next-generation chevrolet impala large sedan and other cars, the company said.
document.title: gm to invest $69 million in michigan plant
lines_and_colors: general motors co plans to invest $69 million and add about 2,500 jobs at its detroit-hamtramck assembly plant to build the next-generation chevrolet impala large sedan and other cars, the company said.
